name: the-forge
description: The Forge is about building a community of decentralized professionals and apprentices alike, who can work together in an agile manner, on a variety of projects. It will provide the tools to track all the various bits of projects, user stories, tasks, resouce management, budget constraints, etc. , and provide for project funding, escrow, and developer payment.
author: Michael Christenson II, Bryan Denslow, and Michael Hoskins
